OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM

Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
April 16, 1958
Mr. Prank E. Schooley
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Thank you for your comment on the JCET memo
by Telford Taylor. I shall reread it carefully
before going to the JCET meeting on April 30 so
that I can bring up the points you mention.
Yours sincerely,
Burton Paulu
President
